trans-unit.source: The 'uv' command was not found, but is required for this Python application. Install uv by following the instructions at https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/
trans-unit.target: The 'uv' command was not found, but is required for this Python application. Install uv by following the instructions at https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/

trans-unit.source: Python virtual environment not found at '{0}'. Create a virtual environment by running 'python -m venv {1}' in the application directory, or use 'uv' for faster environment setup with 'uv venv' (requires uv to be installed).
trans-unit.target: Python virtual environment not found at '{0}'. Create a virtual environment by running 'python -m venv {1}' in the application directory, or use 'uv' for faster environment setup with 'uv venv' (requires uv to be installed).
